Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled quality, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this masterpiece at an exceptional price of $850000. I trust this offer will resonate with your appreciation for high-quality items and I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $850,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $850,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
